excerpt.rendered:
The Bull 50 E is specially designed for propulsion on a durable electric motor. The aluminum sloop is 4,50m long and 1.80m wide. The draft is 0.40 and the headroom 1.10m. The hull weight is 800kg and the design category is D.

Our Bull sloops are pre-eminently very comfortable and indestructible aluminum boats, ideal for canals, small waters and rentals.

Why electric?

The choice for a durable electric motor is one for the future. In some areas you are now only allowed to sail electrically, which is why we offer most models electrically. Advantages of electric boating include that it is more maintenance friendly, more quiet and for rental licenses it is usually a must. Read more advantages of electric propulsion here.

All Alumax boats have self-draining valves in the hull, allowing water to drain easily from the boat. Very handy for cleaning the boat!

Download price list

Financing
